mdRecord.dcterms:title: Allgemeine charte von Nord America als den sitz des krieges zwischen den Konigl. Engl. truppen u:den provinzialen
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pingeling, T. A. (Thomas Albrecht), 1727-1803
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The map displayed here is an unrecorded version of a German broadside known only at the Library of Congress. This state is unique in that it was sold by a different person, and there are differences in the text portion of the broadside. It is a variant state of LC Maps of North America, 1750-1789, 142.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: North America--History--Revolution, 1775-1783--Maps--Early works to 1800
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Richard H. Brown Revolutionary War Map Collection
